unicef-cp16.def: Percentage of children 1–14 years old who experience any violent discipline (psychological aggression and/or physical punishment) in the past month.
unicef-cp16.name: Violent discipline
unicef-cp16.source: DHS, MICS and other national surveys. Last update: February 2021.
unicef-cp16.dataset: DHS, MICS and other national surveys. Last update: February 2021.
